Name: Starry Ore
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable.  Swap a Cleffa Dew and a Cleffa Card for a Starry Ore at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
